item.title: French President Macron 'Pessimistic' About Putin Ending Ukraine War
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron remained skeptical that Russian President Vladimir Putin is interested in ending the war in Ukraine.

item.title: Patel: 21 Arrested Overnight in D.C., Bringing Overall Total to 450
item.description: There were 21 additional arrests overnight by federal law enforcement in Washington, D.C., FBI Director Kash Patel announced on X on Tuesday.
